snippet: The new parity rules apply to most health plans and are effective beginning July 1, although many plans will not have to comply until January of next year.
abstract: Your Money Adviser column on long-awaited improvements in insurance coverage for mental conditions and addictions; new parity rules are expected to become widely available as result of major steps Obama administration has taken.
lead_paragraph: The new parity rules apply to most health plans and are effective beginning July 1, although many plans will not have to comply until January of next year.

headline.main: Understanding New Rules That Widen Mental Health Coverage
headline.print_headline: Understanding New Rules That Widen Mental Health Coverage

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
